name: Potter
description: A craftsman who creates pottery and ceramic goods; adventurers can purchase containers, commission custom pieces, or learn about local pottery traditions.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the earthy scent of clay and the sound of the potter's wheel spinning. The air carries the promise of artistic creation and the essential nature of ceramic craftsmanship, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of creative expression and the transformation of earth into useful beauty.
